Sentences.journey_1: During my wanderings I found few things.
Sentences.journey_2: I decided to take with me...
Sentences.tutorial_5: Rest decrease tiredness, but increases other
Sentences.tutorial_7: Wander allows you to search for foood
Sentences.tutorial_9: Inside inventory you see items from wandering
Sentences.tutorial_10: You can use them for reducing hunger or thirst
Sentences.tutorial_11: If you hover item, you'll see the changes
Sentences.tutorial_13: You can only lift 40kg, so you have to decide
Sentences.tutorial_14: Which items you'll take with you
